description:
Keroro`s father is coming to visit, and inspect his son`s progress in invading Pekopon!  Will Keroro be able to convince his father that he`s not just totally slacking off?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Chichi Kitaru Chichi Kaeru de Arimasu / Keroro Onsen Go! Go! Go! de Arimasu
Should I Spa or Should I Go Now?
Un papa encombrant / Station thermale à gogo !
ケロロ 父キタル父カエル であります / ケロロ 温泉GO! GO! GO! であります
